meaning_str.bing:
v. 试验；试用；测试（能力、质量、性能等）
n. 审判；试用；考验；选拔赛
adj. 同“trinal”
网络. 审讯；尝试；审理

试验；试用；测试（能力、质量、性能等）

审理；（对能力、质量、性能等的）试验；测试；实验；试用；试飞（飞机等）；试演（戏剧等）；试听（音乐等）；比赛；试用期；试行；（法院的）审讯
试验（产品、想法等）；测试（性能等）；进行试用；选拔（参加比赛的人或动物）

1.en: They did not at all think the failure of their first trial would cut at their plan; they insisted on trying, trying again.
1.cn: 他们丝毫不认为第一次试验的失败会破坏他们的计划；他们坚持要试了再试。

2.en: She even got a job, sort of. She had a 90-day trial, but was not hired at the end of it.
2.cn: 遗憾的是，后来虽然经过了90天的上岗实践，但一份基本到手的工作最后还是“抛弃”了她。

3.en: At the beginning of the trial, a great deal of time was spent selecting the jurors.
3.cn: 审判开始时，用了大量的时间挑选陪审员。

0.en: Two others? Well, it was trial and error. We had to find the right waistband.
0.cn: 另两个？我们反复试验来着，得找到合适的裤腰尺寸。

1.en: That's an odd mix of people. Well, for our first time hosting, I thought it would be wise to conduct a trial run.
1.cn: 客人的组合好奇怪啊。我们第一次邀请客人来家里，我认为先做个试验是明智之举。

2.en: I'll see you at court, okay? At the trial.
2.cn: 法庭上见了，好吗? 开庭的时候。

3.en: Yes, it will, at your trial. This is real, Howard.
3.cn: 是的，没错，霍华德，你要被审讯这是真的。

4.en: Answer honestly. This is not a trial. That'll come later.
4.cn: 说实话就行了，这又不是在审问你，之后才会审问。

5.en: After the trial. Peter, it's a formality. The apartment's mine.
5.cn: 庭审后。彼得，这只是手续，这间公寓是我的。

6.en: You paid that? Free trial. I took the test to see if I qualify for the free trial.
6.cn: 你付款了吗？免费试听，我做了测试，看看我符不符合免费试听资格。

7.en: Yes, Jeffrey Grant, the guy on trial. He was in here.
7.cn: 对，杰弗里·格兰特，那个正在受审的家伙，他那晚在这儿。

8.en: It's all because of my dad's whole trial thing, you know?
8.cn: 都是因为我爸被审问的事，你知道吧？

9.en: Before the trial, I never thought about the past. I never had to.
9.cn: 在审判之前，我从没想过以前的事。我从来没那个必要。

10.en: Yes, until he resigned two days ago. Yes, but he was privy to our trial strategy.
10.cn: 是的，直到两天前他辞职了。是，但他了解我们的检控策略。

11.en: I'd live in terror, dreading every race, every practice, every trial. I cannot do it!
11.cn: 我会活得心惊胆战，每次他比赛练习，试驾，都忧心忡忡，我做不到！

12.en: Well, they're not talking about trial strategy, they're talking about moving Diane out.
12.cn: 他们讨论的不是庭审策略，而是怎么排挤戴安。

13.en: So I won't ask about trial strategy. This is about the prosecution perjuring themselves.
13.cn: 所以我不会问检控策略的，这是关于控方作假证。

14.en: Cause one of the victims happened to write a book. That's why they're on trial and nobody else!
14.cn: 碰巧有个受害者写了本书，所以只有她们接受审判，其他人都没事！

15.en: It isn't just growing food as a trial of ingenuity, in some parts of China, it's just living there.
15.cn: 不仅仅是食物的生产，在中国某些地方，仅是在此生存就是对聪敏才智的试炼。

16.en: His current murder trial. I told him that the parents of his client came to me for a second opinion.
16.cn: 他手上的谋杀案，我告诉他，他客户的父母来找我，让我提供不同意见。

17.en: You choose six women, you put them on trial, you say, "They were the evil ones, they were the guilty ones."
17.cn: 选出六个女人，对她们进行审判，然后说“她们是邪恶者，她们才是罪人”。

18.en: Where is your prisoner, Kirk? Per Starfleet regulation, I'm planning on returning Khan to Earth to stand trial.
18.cn: 你的犯人在哪里，柯克？根据星际舰队规定，我计划遣送可汗回到地球受审。

19.en: Tell me! I'm asking! What is there to understand? I started out believing in this trial. I thought it was great.
19.cn: 告诉我！我在问你话！哪一点值得理解？我一开始还相信着。这将是场伟大的审判。
